curam.util.resources

Interface EnvironmentConstants.Custom

  • Enclosing interface:
    EnvironmentConstants

    public static interface EnvironmentConstants.Custom
    These settings allow a developer to replace elements of the Curam infrastructure with their own customized handlers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String kAuditWriter
      Default: curam.util.internal.misc.StandardDatabaseAudit.
      static java.lang.String kCallbackClassPropertyName
      The name of the application class that implements the DPCallback interface.
      static java.lang.String kCustomExternalOperationHook
      Specifies the fully qualified class name of the customized external operation Hook which implements curam.util.audit.ExternalOperationHook.
      static java.lang.String kDatabaseWriteCallback
      The name of the application class that implements the DatabaseWriteCallback interface.
      static java.lang.String kDisableDatabaseCallback
      If set to true this property will disable the database callback.
      static java.lang.String kNotificationDeliveryClassPropertyName
      Specifies the name of the application class that implements the NotificationDelivery interface.
      static java.lang.String kNoXmlAudit
      If set to true this property will disable the existing audit writer.
      static java.lang.String kPreDataAccessHook
      The name of the class that implements the interface curam.util.audit.DataAccessHook.
      static java.lang.String kProcessDefinitionCacheSizePropertyName
      Default: 250.
      static java.lang.String kTransactionCallback
      The name of the application class that implements the TransactionCallback interface.
      static java.lang.String kWorkflowWebServiceBPOPropertyName
      The name of the application BPO that workflow process enactment web services go through.
      static java.lang.String kWorkResolverClassPropertyName
      The name of the application class that implements the WorkResolver interface.

      • kAuditWriter

        static final java.lang.String kAuditWriter
        Default: curam.util.internal.misc.StandardDatabaseAudit. The name of the class which will handle the generated audit information. This class must extend curam.util.audit.AuditLogInterface. curam.util.audit.DisabledAudit may be used to globally disable auditing. Property name : curam.custom.audit.writer
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kPreDataAccessHook

        static final java.lang.String kPreDataAccessHook
        The name of the class that implements the interface curam.util.audit.DataAccessHook. Property name : curam.custom.predataaccess.hook
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kCustomExternalOperationHook

        static final java.lang.String kCustomExternalOperationHook
        Specifies the fully qualified class name of the customized external operation Hook which implements curam.util.audit.ExternalOperationHook. An external operation is an operation callable as a remote, batch, webservice or deferred process call. Property name : curam.custom.external.operation.hook
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
